title: Support looking for a duo, or team
body:
Main support with many different champs, also play top/jg

Was silver, but now bronze from not playing, keen to join up with someone/team to climb and learn.

25 years old, have mic, willing to learn new roles if needed, able to play most nights.

replies.body:
Deathscar0908
Main: mid (malzahar)
Gold s3, Silver currently 
Can do any lane otherwise
wanna join a ranked team mate? were looking for a support add me in game
